schema.title: Update Token Marketing Information
schema.description: Updates the token's marketing information (if added).

excluded-value-warning.description: Leaving any of these fields blank will leave the original values unchanged.

project.title: Project URL
project.description: A URL pointing to the project behind this token.

description.title: Token Description
description.description: A longer description of the token and it's utility. Designed for tooltips or such.

marketing.title: Authorized Marketing Address
marketing.description: The address (if any) who can update this data structure.
